title: Channel migrants: More than 200 migrants cross in small boats
content: The Ministry of Defence said 202 people crossed the English Channel in five small boats on Wednesday.It has been four days since the last crossing, bringing the total number of arrivals in July to 2,976, compared to over 3,500 in July 2021.A government spokesman said the crossings were "unacceptable".He added the government was continuing with its preparations to relocate those who make the crossing to Rwanda where their claims will be considered.Follow BBC South East on Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/BBCSE/>, on Twitter <https://twitter.com/bbcsoutheast>, and on Instagram <https://www.instagram.com/bbcsoutheast/>. Send your story ideas to southeasttoday@bbc.co.uk.
